CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 1, 1957, pg. 28 reads: "New Champ - John Bradford captured the Singles Classic League championship at the Meadow Lanes bowling alleys last Friday night. Bradford had a winning total of 40 points in nine games.  His top games were 222 and 221.  Bradford rolls for the Wemco Club in the Steel City League. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of John Bradford wearing light colored bowling shirt with masonic patch, holding bowling ball, standing behind upholstered sofa
